channel.title: Plugin Development Tutorial for Atlassian JIRA® | Kitchen Duty Plugin by comSysto
channel.description: An interactive step-by-step tutorial on how to write Plugins for Atlassian JIRA® by comSysto

item.title: Atlassian announces React JS as new UI Kit
item.description: Atlassian has announced the future of AUI will be based on React JS.

item.title: Kitchen Duty Planning REST Resource (step 4) finished
item.description: Step 4 of the tutorial is finished and describes how to persist Data with Active Objects and provide a REST API on top of that.

item.title: Continuing with Kitchen Duty Planning REST Resource (step 4)
item.description: Continuing the tutorial and soon there will be new content. I will inform on the news page and via RSS. I am sorry that so much time passed. I had some other blog posts to publish in the meantime. But now Kitchen Duty is back as top priority.

item.title: News online
item.description: I will inform via RSS feed on updates to this tutorial.
